definitions.definition: The process of making something, or becoming, thick or viscous .
A substance , usually a source of starch , used to thicken a sauce .
A thickened part of a structure .

main_definition: The process of making something, or becoming, thick or viscous .
secondary_definitions: A substance , usually a source of starch , used to thicken a sauce .
A thickened part of a structure .
